item.title: Free Toll Gate v1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 30, 2025

Free Toll Gate v1.55 ETS2

– Collisions were removed when passing through the barrier of a payment point.
– You can safely pass through the barrier without waiting for it to fully open.
– Also you can drive for free through cash payment.

Update for v1.55

Credits: DenTorn

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania LK140 BY PAULO JUNIOR 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 29, 2025

Scania LK140 BY PAULO JUNIOR 1.55 ETS2

The Scania LK140 1.55 by Paulo Junior refers to a popular mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), created or updated by a modder known as Paulo Junior. These kinds of mods aim to bring classic and iconic trucks, like the Scania LK140, into the game with high levels of detail and customization.

Here’s what you can generally expect from a mod like this:

Key Features of ETS2 Truck Mods
Classic Truck Recreation: The Scania LK140 is a legendary truck, known for its powerful V8 engine and robust design. Mods like this bring that classic aesthetic and feel into the virtual world of ETS2.
High-Quality Model and Textures: Modders often invest significant time in creating detailed 3D models and realistic textures to ensure the truck looks authentic, both inside and out. This includes accurate dashboards, exterior details, and lighting.
Customization Options: A good truck mod offers a wide range of customization. For the Scania LK140, this might include:
Multiple Chassis Options: Different axle configurations (e.g., 4×2, 6×2, 6×4) to suit various trailer types and driving preferences.
Engine and Transmission Choices: Options for various engine power outputs (often including the powerful V8 sounds) and different gearbox configurations.
Interior Accessories: Compatibility with in-game cabin accessories, allowing players to personalize their truck’s interior.
Exterior Customization: A variety of parts like bumpers, side skirts, exhaust pipes, antennas, lights (including fog lights, beacons, etc.), and paint options (metallic, custom colors, pre-defined skins). Some mods even include “Bepo” style accessories, which are popular in Brazil.
Realistic Sounds: One of the most important aspects of a truck mod is its sound. Modders often work to include custom, realistic engine sounds, air brake sounds, horn sounds, and even interior sounds like turn signals, to enhance immersion. Some mods are known to use sounds from renowned sound modders like “Rafa Sound.”
Compatibility: Mods are generally designed to be compatible with specific versions of ETS2 (e.g., 1.49, 1.50, 1.54, 1.55). It’s crucial to use the mod with the correct game version to avoid crashes or issues.
Standalone Mod: Most truck mods are “standalone,” meaning they appear as a separate truck in the game’s truck dealerships (often under “Mod Dealer” or similar).
Optimized Performance: Good modders also work to optimize their creations so they don’t cause excessive lag or performance issues in the game.

Paulo Junior is a modder who frequently releases or updates mods for ETS2, often focusing on Brazilian-style trucks and accessories. His mods are generally well-regarded within the ETS2 community for their quality and attention to detail.

Credits: CLUB ROTAS

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Volvo FH 2025 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 29, 2025

Volvo FH 2025 v1.0 ETS2

The Volvo FH 2025 series has been released with several significant updates focusing on enhanced safety, efficiency, and driver comfort. These advancements are being rolled out globally, with specific features and legislations respected in each market.

Here are some of the key highlights of the Volvo FH 2025:

Key Innovations and Features
Camera Monitoring System (CMS) / MirrorCams (Optional): One of the most noticeable changes is the option for camera-based external mirrors. These smaller components reduce aerodynamic drag, leading to better fuel economy and less wind noise. They also offer enhanced visibility, especially at night with infrared technology, and can automatically adjust to follow the end of the trailer for improved safety during maneuvers.

Enhanced I-See System: The I-See system, which uses artificial intelligence and cloud-based data to optimize gear selection and speed based on road topography, has been further improved. It now anticipates curves and roundabouts, providing greater predictability for the driver, better fuel efficiency, and increased safety. This advanced use of cloud data is a significant technological leap for Volvo.

Tire Pressure and Temperature Monitoring System: This system allows drivers and fleet managers to remotely monitor the condition of all tires through the Volvo Connect platform, ensuring greater safety and operational efficiency by alerting to low pressure, rapid leaks, or high temperatures.

Aerodynamic and Aesthetic Updates: The FH 2025 features a revised exterior design with improved aerodynamics and a more modern look. This includes new visual identifications, such as a larger and more prominent Volvo logo on the front panel and refreshed emblems.

Improved Interior Comfort: The cabin has been designed for optimal driver comfort during long journeys. It includes ample storage, a dual-compartment refrigerator, a comfortable bed, and improved ergonomics for the ignition key and remote control. New USB-C outlets ensure faster smartphone charging.

Advanced Safety Systems: Beyond the Camera Monitoring System, the FH 2025 also incorporates features like a Traffic Sign Recognition and an Collision Warning with Emergency Braking system. Volvo’s exclusive Knife-Folding Brake system (optional) also helps prevent jackknifing between the truck and trailer by applying micro-brakes to the trailer.

Engine Updates: While details vary by region, there are mentions of a new 17-liter engine (though still often referred to as FH16) with variations up to 780 horsepower, enhancing power and efficiency.

Pilot Assist (Optional): For models with electric steering (VDS), the Pilot Assist function, an assisted autopilot, is available.

The Volvo FH 2025 represents a continuous evolution of Volvo’s heavy-duty truck line, aiming to provide a more technologically advanced, safer, and more economical vehicle for the modern transport industry. Many of these new features are also being incorporated into the Volvo FM and FMX 2025 models.

Credits: VANDELEY

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
